Description: Brand RepresentativeWe are seeking an enthusiastic, dynamic and presentable candidate to join our team as a Brand Representative. The ideal candidate will be the face and voice of our company's social media campaigns, responsible for presenting our products, services, and brand to both local and global audience.Skills
Skills: This role requires a captivating on-screen presence, exceptional communication skills, and a deep understanding of social media trends and platforms.
English & Arabic fluency in both writing, speaking, and reading is mandatory.
